prompt_base: 8k cinematic photo, muscular man, piercing blue eyes, long flowing white hair, rugged facial features, determined expression, outdoor lighting
feature_prompt: visible skin texture, source palette preservation, identical color matching, detailed fabric weave, canvas hat material, individual hair strands
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, smooth hair, deformed, low quality, blurry face, (deformed hat:1.2), feminine
